tool_description: Map Tiles for interactive online maps based on data by OpenStreetMap contributors with labels in English, French or Spanish.
name: MapTiles
title: MapTiles

api_list.name: getMapTilewithSpanishLabels
api_list.description: Raster Map Tiles with Spanish Labels. Please see [tutorial](https://rapidapi.com/MapTilesApi/api/maptiles/tutorials/openstreetmap-in-spanish---add-a-spanish-map-to-your-website-with-leaflet-js-and-maptiles-api) on how to use the Spanish world map.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://maptiles.p.rapidapi.com/es/map/v1/3/4/2.png"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "maptiles.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://maptiles.p.rapidapi.com/es/map/v1/{z}/{x}/{y}.png"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "maptiles.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: getMapTilewithEnglishLabels
api_list.description: Raster Map Tiles with English Labels. Please see our [tutorials page](https://rapidapi.com/MapTilesApi/api/maptiles/tutorials) on how to use this.

api_list.name: getStandardMapTile
api_list.description: Standard tiles with labels in local language for a place (untranslated and untransliterated) as known from OpenStreetMap
api_list.code:

url = "https://maptiles.p.rapidapi.com/local/osm/v1/3/6/3.png"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "maptiles.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
